subject: Broken spring retainer
description_text:
Hi I have recently purchased your pro X pedal set and the accelerator pedal
has broken peice of plastic that holds the spring that activates the
pressure sensor. Is it possible to get a replacement retainer

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Norman,     Please provide your order number, a photo of the damaged pedal, as well as your contact person, phone number, and shipping address. We will arrange to send you the improved replacement parts today to fix the damaged components.

Order number #ssn1995
Anthony Norman
+61490708418
260 church Rd Hazelwood north Victoria 3840 Australia

On Mon, 15 Sept 2025, 10:21 am support@simsonn.com,
Hello, we have now reissued the entire throttle pedal for you. Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045921968240
